A MR2 Christmas song...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: A MR2 Christmas song...
By lovesaurian on Wednesday, November 29, 2000 - 04:53 pm:

To the tune of Jolly Old St. Nicolas:

Jolly old satan clause,
lean your ear this way.
Don't you tell a single soul,
what I'm going to say.
Colt's end is drawing near,
now you dear old monster.
Whisper what you'll do to her,
tell me if you dare!

I just realized that Satan Clause is monster #86....

By Time Noise on Friday, June 1, 2001 - 05:13 pm:

I'm kinda new here, but I wrote a little song along similar lines, to the tune of "Santa Claus is Coming to Town":

Chorus:
Oh, Colt better watch out/
This Wracky's not nice/
He's gonna' come gouge out/
Both of her eyes/
SA-TAN CLAUS I-I-I-SSS COM-ING/
TOOO TOWWWWWWN!/

Oh Colt's annoyed trainer/
Paid o'le Satan Clause nice/
Now we'll see if her heart beats right/

(Chorus)

He knows what you are feeding/
Your monster for the month/
If you feed them potatoes/
He'll eat you're spleen for lunch!/

(Chorus2x)

By Time Noise on Friday, June 1, 2001 - 06:37 pm:

I realize this is a rather odd time to write a Christmas Carol, but this is my brainchild from back in September. ^_^
